sentences.sContent: ...labor and civic leaders from around the country from outside Washington to get their ideas and input as well...
...The prime minister denied there was a connection between his news adviser’s outside interests and the change in legislative programme...
...and 60% use their smartphones to check in with work outside of normal working hours...
...The fix is a security technology used heavily outside the US...
...little noticed outside the medical establishment but already controversial inside it...
...not least of which is the opportunity to interact with positive role models outside of regular school hours...
...They say that they are drawn to the prospect of learning applications outside the classroom...
...most children outside of the United States are expected to become bilingual or even...
...most graduates end up working outside academia...
You can park your car outside our house.
sentences.sCn: 你可以把汽车停在我们家屋外。

synos.tran: 外面的，[计]外部的；外来的

phrases.pCn: 从外侧向内侧的；从外缘向中心的

trans.tranOther: on or to a place on the outside of sth
